mapper.update:
UPDATE `mqms_market_bulletin` SET
`failure_date` = #{set.failureDate},
`vin_code` = #{set.vinCode},
`short_code` = #{set.shortCode},
`trans_category` = #{set.transCategory},
`eng_code` = #{set.engCode},
`car_model` = #{set.carModel},
`eng_type` = #{set.engType},
`trans_type` = #{set.transType},
`manufacture_date` = #{set.manufactureDate},
`infor_source` = #{set.inforSource},
`sales_date` = #{set.salesDate},
`parts_name` = #{set.partsName},
`theme` = #{set.theme},
`countermeasure_state` = #{set.countermeasureState},
`dealer_name` = #{set.dealerName},
`mileage` = #{set.mileage},
`failure_desc` = #{set.failureDesc},
`diagnostic_result` = #{set.diagnosticResult},
`maintenance_record` = #{set.maintenanceRecord},
`analytical_progress` = #{set.analyticalProgress},
`controversy_with_ST` = #{set.controversyWithST},
`settle_scheme` = #{set.settleScheme},
`claim_form` = #{set.claimForm},
`processing_scheme_ST` = #{set.processingSchemeST},
`return_progress` = #{set.returnProgress},
`return_mode` = #{set.returnMode},
`delivery_received_date` = #{set.deliveryReceivedDate},
`applier_id` = #{set.applierId},
`applier_name` = #{set.applierName},
`apply_time` = #{set.applyTime},
`market_bulletin_id` in
#{item} and
`market_bulletin_id` >= #{where.marketBulletinIdSt} and
`market_bulletin_id` <= #{where.marketBulletinIdEd} and
`failure_date` in
#{item} and
(
`Failure_date` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Failure_date` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and

#{item} and

) and
